word_mean: 干预：对动作或过程的干涉或干扰
干涉：指两个或两个以上的同一频率的光、声或电磁波的交会，从而相互增强或抵消，所产生的波幅等于交会波幅的总和
干扰：指心脏中两个内在起搏点的相互作用，其中之一控制心脏节律。另见dissociation项下的interference dissociation
阻碍，障碍：在牙科，指牙的面上任一早接触点妨碍面最大程度的接触，妨碍咀嚼功能，妨碍充分咬合的最佳排列。另见contact项下的deflective occlusal contact
由于干扰信号或噪声而对有用信号的接收造成的骚扰。
全称“染色体干涉（chromosomal interference）”。连锁的基因间发生一次单交换后影响其邻近位置上发生第二次单交换的现象。

sentence.Network_en: The parliament described the decree as interference in the republic's internal affairs.
sentence.Network_cn: 议会形容此法令为对共和国内政的干涉。

sentence.Network_en: It is hard to imagine her taking kindly to too much interference.
sentence.Network_cn: 很难想象她会喜欢被人过多地干涉。

sentence.Network_en: They have been accused of deliberately causing interference to transmissions.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们被指故意干扰信号传输。

jx.jx_en_mean: (American Football)move in such a way as to cause interference. (see sense 1)
jx.jx_cn_mean: (美橄)作掩护阻挡。 （见前面义项1）

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from interfere, on the pattern of words such as difference

entry.def: Interference by a person or group is their unwanted or unnecessary involvement in something.

example.ex: The parliament described the decree as interference in the republic's internal affairs...
example.tran: 议会形容此法令为对共和国内政的干涉。

example.ex: Airlines will be able to set cheap fares without interference from the government.
example.tran: 航空公司将能脱离政府干预设定便宜的机票价格。

entry.def: When there is interference, a radio signal is affected by other radio waves or electrical activity so that it cannot be received properly.

example.ex: They have been accused of deliberately causing interference to transmissions.
example.tran: 他们被指故意干扰信号传输。

means.word_mean: 1. a policy of intervening in the affairs of other countries
2. the act of hindering or obstructing or impeding
3. electrical or acoustic activity that can disturb communication
4. (American football) the act of obstructing someone's path with your body;

sentences.sentence: "he threw a rolling block into the line backer"

means.word_mean: 5. any obstruction that impedes or is burdensome

sentences.en: I wanted to do the thing on my own without outside interference or help.
sentences.cn: 我想独立完成这件事, 不受外界干扰, 也不要外来帮助。

means.word_mean: 阻碍, （无线电信号的）干扰

sentences.en: I couldn't hear the program because there was too much interference.
sentences.cn: 因干扰太大, 我听不清节目。

jushi.english: I wanted to do the thing on my own without outside interference or help.
jushi.chinese: 我想独立完成这件事,不受外界干扰,也不要外来帮助。

jushi.english: The problem requires governmental interference for its solution.
jushi.chinese: 这个问题需要政府干预才能解决。
